titleStmt.title: A treatise of the way to life, deuided into three partes The first part sheweth howe, by sinne wee haue deserued Gods curse. The second parte sheweth me, howe wee are freed from the curse, and the law satisfied. The thirde part teacheth vs, what duetyes and thankefulnesse we owe to the Lorde, for this benefite of our redemption.
titleStmt.author: B. A., fl. 1580.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
